dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach uncertain situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will weigh risks carefully and avoid making impulsive decisions.
Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges and pursue uncertain opportunities.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize saving money and avoiding unnecessary expenses.
Your FarTwin will prioritize enjoying life's luxuries and spending freely, even if it means overspending.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer learning through books, lectures, and formal education.
Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experiences, experiments, and real-world applications.

dimensions.label: Social Connections
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to spend time alone or with close friends, valuing personal space.
Your FarTwin will thrive in social situations, seeking out new friendships and connections.

dimensions.label: Physical Activity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize physical health?

options.description: Your FarTwin will maintain a strict workout routine, prioritizing physical fitness and appearance.
Your FarTwin will engage in regular exercise, but not prioritize it above other aspects of life.

dimensions.label: Humor Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will appreciate dry, sarcastic humor and use it to deflect or mock.
Your FarTwin will enjoy playing pranks and using physical comedy to lighten the mood.

dimensions.label: Leisure Activities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin spend free time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize watching movies, TV shows, and documentaries.
Your FarTwin will spend most of their free time playing video games or engaging in gaming-related activities.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize visual arts, writing, or music as means of creative expression.
Your FarTwin will engage in immersive activities like cosplay, prop-making, or building sets for creative projects.
